query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
1 Guardando nel suo Figlio con l’Amore 2 che l’uno e l’altro etternalmente spira, 3 lo primo e ineffabile Valore
query.error: **English:** 1 Looking at his Son with the Love 2 that the one and the other eternally breathe, 3 the first and ineffable Power
query.result: 1 Putraṃ premaṇāvalokya svaṃ 2 Yena ubhau nityam anilam iva vāyuḥ, 3 Ādyam avyaktātmānaṃ parama-mahimānam

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
4 quanto per mente e per loco si gira 5 con tant’ ordine fé, ch’esser non puote 6 sanza gustar di lui chi ciò rimira.
query.error: **English:** 4 as much as can be grasped by mind and place 5 with such order made, that it cannot be 6 without tasting of him who contemplates it.
query.result: 4 Yāvatī buddhyā deśena ca paricaryate 5 Tāvatā krameṇa cakāra sa īśvaraḥ, 6 Yathā tam dṛṣṭvā na bhuñjīta kaścana.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
7 Leva dunque, lettore, a l’alte rote 8 meco la vista, dritto a quella parte 9 dove l’un moto e l’altro si percuote;
query.error: **English:** 7 Lift up your eyes, reader, to the lofty wheels 8 with me, straight to that part 9 where one motion strikes the other;

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
10 e lì comincia a vagheggiar ne l’arte 11 di quel maestro che dentro a sé l’ama, 12 tanto che mai da lei l’occhio non parte.
query.error: **English:** 10 and there begin to gaze with wonder at the art 11 of that master who loves it within himself, 12 so much that his eyes never leave it.
query.result: 10 tatra ca ārabdhaṃ kuru vicāritum kalayām 11 tasya ācāryasya yaḥ antaḥ ātmānam enam premate, 12 yāvat na kadācit tasmāt dṛṣṭiḥ viyujyate.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
13 Vedi come da indi si dirama 14 l’oblico cerchio che i pianeti porta, 15 per sodisfare al mondo che li chiama.
query.error: **English:** 13 You see how from here branches out 14 the oblique circle that carries the planets, 15 to satisfy the world that calls to them.
query.result: 13 Paśya yathā atraiva viśīrṇam 14 tiryak cakram bibharti grahāṇ, 15 lokam āhvayantātṛptikāmaṃ.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
16 Che se la strada lor non fosse torta, 17 molta virtù nel ciel sarebbe in vano, 18 e quasi ogne potenza qua giù morta;
query.error: **English:** 16 If their path were not twisted, 17 much virtue in heaven would be in vain, 18 and nearly every power down here would be dead;

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
19 e se dal dritto più o men lontano 20 fosse ’l partire, assai sarebbe manco 21 e giù e sù de l’ordine mondano.
query.error: **English:** 19 and if the departure from the straight path were more or less, 20 there would be much less 21 both above and below of the worldly order.
query.result: 19 tataś ca yadi satpathaḥ adhikaṃ vā alpam vā viparītaḥ syāt, 20 tataḥ bahu hīnam syāt 21 adhastāt api ūrdhvaṃ api laukikasyānusaṃdhānasya.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
22 Or ti riman, lettor, sovra ’l tuo banco, 23 dietro pensando a ciò che si preliba, 24 s’esser vuoi lieto assai prima che stanco.
query.error: **English:** 22 Now you remain, reader, upon your bench, 23 reflecting on what has been foretasted, 24 if you wish to be joyful long before you are weary.
query.result: 22 Idānīm tvam tiṣṭhasi, vācaka, tava pīṭhasya upari, 23 paścāt cintāyan yat pūrvanirdiṣṭam, 24 yadi bhavituṃ icchasi āturamatipūrvam eva santuṣṭaḥ.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
25 Messo t’ho innanzi: omai per te ti ciba; 26 ché a sé torce tutta la mia cura 27 quella materia ond’ io son fatto scriba.
query.error: **English:** 25 I have set it before you: now feed yourself on it; 26 for all my care is now turned to that subject 27 from which I am made a scribe.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
28 Lo ministro maggior de la natura, 29 che del valor del ciel lo mondo imprenta 30 e col suo lume il tempo ne misura,
query.error: **English:** 28 The greatest minister of nature, 29 who imprints the world with the power of the heavens 30 and measures time with his light,
query.result: 28 Pradhānaḥprakṛteḥkartā, 29 yaḥsvargasyaśaktyājagatmudrayati 30 svaprakāśenacālamānaṃkālamāpnoti,

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
31 con quella parte che sù si rammenta 32 congiunto, si girava per le spire 33 in che più tosto ognora s’appresenta;
query.error: **English:** 31 was turning, joined with that part which is remembered above, 32 through the coils in which he always appears more quickly; 33 and I was with him; but I did not notice the ascent,

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
34 e io era con lui; ma del salire 35 non m’accors’ io, se non com’ uom s’accorge, 36 anzi ’l primo pensier, del suo venire.
query.error: **English:** 34 except as a man notices, or rather, the first thought, of his coming.
query.result: 34 ahamca tena saha; na tu māmārohaṇasya 35 jñānamājagāma, yathā vā puruṣaḥprāpnoti, 36 vāstavam, prathamamcintaṃ, tasyaāgamasya.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
37 È Bëatrice quella che sì scorge 38 di bene in meglio, sì subitamente 39 che l’atto suo per tempo non si sporge.
query.error: **English:** 37 It is Beatrice who thus reveals herself 38 from good to better, so suddenly 39 that her action does not extend itself in time.
query.result: 37 Sā Bēātrīcē sā yā tathā prakāśatē 38 śubhāt śubhataram, tathāsatvarēṇa 39 yathā karmaṇastasyāḥ kālaḥ na vistarata iti.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
40 Quant’ esser convenia da sé lucente 41 quel ch’era dentro al sol dov’ io entra’mi, 42 non per color, ma per lume parvente!
query.error: **English:** 40 How much it was necessary for him to be shining by himself, 41 he who was inside the sun where I entered, 42 not because of color, but because of light appearing!
query.result: 40 Katham svayam prakāśamānasya bhavituṃ yuktam āsīt 41 yasya madhye aham praviṣṭavān asmi, 42 na varṇāt, kim tu prakāśāt prakāśamānasya!

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
43 Perch’ io lo ’ngegno e l’arte e l’uso chiami, 44 sì nol direi che mai s’imaginasse; 45 ma creder puossi e di veder si brami.
query.error: **English:** 43 Therefore, I call upon my intellect, art, and experience, 44 so that I may say it in such a way that it was never imagined; 45 but it can be believed and desired to be seen.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
46 E se le fantasie nostre son basse 47 a tanta altezza, non è maraviglia; 48 ché sopra ’l sol non fu occhio ch’andasse.
query.error: **English:** 46 And if our fantasies are low 47 at such a height, it is no wonder; 48 for above the sun no eye has ever gone.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
49 Tal era quivi la quarta famiglia 50 de l’alto Padre, che sempre la sazia, 51 mostrando come spira e come figlia.
query.error: **English:** 49 Such was here the fourth family 50 of the High Father, who always satisfies it, 51 showing how it breathes and how it gives birth.
query.result: 49 Tathātra caturthī parivāraḥ 50 Uttama-pitur yaḥ sadā tām tarpayati, 51 Darśayan katham anilaḥ śvasiti katham ca prajāyate.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
52 E Bëatrice cominciò: «Ringrazia, 53 ringrazia il Sol de li angeli, ch’a questo 54 sensibil t’ha levato per sua grazia».
query.error: **English:** 52 And Beatrice began: "Give thanks, 53 give thanks to the Sun of the angels, who has raised you to this 54 sensible world through his grace."
query.result: 52 Evaṃ ca Bēatrice ārabhata: "Kṛta jñānam, 53 kṛta jñānam sūryāya devānām, yaḥ etasmin 54 sanjñāne jagati tvām udvīkṣayām āsa svayaṃ anugraheṇa."

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.

Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.

query.error: **English:** 61 She was not displeased; rather, she laughed, 62 so that the splendor of her laughing eyes 63 divided my unified mind into many parts.
query.result: 61 Na sā virakta; api tu sā hasitavān, 62 Yataḥ hasanmukhānāṃ netrāṇāṃ tejasaḥ 63 Mama ekatra sthitā buddhiḥ anekeṣu vibhaktā abhūt.

Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.

Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.

query.error: **English:** 70 In the court of heaven, from which I return, 71 many dear and beautiful joys are found, 72 so much so that they cannot be brought out of the kingdom;

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.

85 multiplicato in te tanto resplende, 86 che ti conduce su per quella scala 87 u’ sanza risalir nessun discende;

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
88 qual ti negasse il vin de la sua fiala 89 per la tua sete, in libertà non fora 90 se non com’ acqua ch’al mar non si cala.
query.error: **English:** 88 who would deny you the wine from his flask 89 for your thirst, would not be free 90 except as water that does not flow into the sea.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
91 Tu vuo’ saper di quai piante s’infiora 92 questa ghirlanda che ’ntorno vagheggia 93 la bella donna ch’al ciel t’avvalora.
query.error: **English:** 91 You wish to know of what plants this garland is adorned 92 that encircles the beautiful lady who strengthens you towards heaven.
query.result: 91 Tvam vettuṃ icchasi kair vṛkṣaiḥ puṣpitā 92 ayam mālā yā paritaḥ sobhatē 93 sundarī strī yā tvām svargam prati vardhayati.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
94 Io fui de li agni de la santa greggia 95 che Domenico mena per cammino 96 u’ ben s’impingua se non si vaneggia.
query.error: **English:** 94 I was one of the sheep of the holy flock 95 that Dominic leads along the way 96 where one fattens well if he does not stray.
query.result: 94 Ahaṃ āsam agnayaḥ puṇyāyaḥ paśūnāṃ 95 Yān Dominkaḥ nayati mārgeṇa 96 Yatra suvarṇaṃ vardhate yadi na mūḍhabhāvaḥ.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
97 Questi che m’è a destra più vicino, 98 frate e maestro fummi, ed esso Alberto 99 è di Cologna, e io Thomas d’Aquino.
query.error: **English:** 97 This one who is closest to me on the right, 98 was my brother and teacher, and he is Albert, 99 he is from Cologne, and I am Thomas Aquinas.
query.result: 97 Ayaṃ yaḥ mama dakṣiṇataḥ adhikaṁ समीpe, 98 sa mama bhrātā ācāryaś ca āsīt, sa ca Alberto nāma, 99 sa Kolagna-nivāsaḥ, aham tu Thomas Aquinas nāma.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
100 Se sì di tutti li altri esser vuo’ certo, 101 di retro al mio parlar ten vien col viso 102 girando su per lo beato serto.
query.error: **English:** 100 If you wish to be certain of all the others, 101 follow me with your gaze behind my speech, 102 circling upward on the blessed wreath.
query.result: 100 Yadi tvam anyeṣām api sarveṣām niścitam icchasi, 101 mama vākya-paścāt tava dṛṣṭiḥ āgacchatu, 102 ārohaṇam kṛtvā uttama-mālāyāṃ paribhramaṇam kṛtvā.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
103 Quell’ altro fiammeggiare esce del riso 104 di Grazïan, che l’uno e l’altro foro 105 aiutò sì che piace in paradiso.
query.error: **English:** 103 That other flaming issues from the smile 104 of Grace, who aided both of them 105 so that they are pleasing in paradise.
query.result: 103 Sa aparo jyotirniṣpadyate hasyāt 104 Śrīgrahasya, yaḥ ubhayam api sthānam 105 Sahakāri yathā ramate svarge.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
106 L’altro ch’appresso addorna il nostro coro, 107 quel Pietro fu che con la poverella 108 offerse a Santa Chiesa suo tesoro.
query.error: **English:** 106 The other who adorns our choir next, 107 was that Peter who with the poor woman 108 offered his treasure to Holy Church.
query.result: 106 Anyaḥ yaḥ paścāt asmākam gaṇam alamkaroti, 107 saḥ śrīmān pitaraḥ āsīt yaḥ daridrayā saha 108 apanīyam sampadam śrīmaccarkāya samarpayām āsa.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
109 La quinta luce, ch’è tra noi più bella, 110 spira di tale amor, che tutto ’l mondo 111 là giù ne gola di saper novella:
query.error: **English:** 109 The fifth light, which is the most beautiful among us, 110 breathes forth such love that the whole world 111 down there in the abyss yearns to know the news:
query.result: 109 Pañcamī jyotir yā asmāsu śobhanatarā, 110 sā evaṃrūpaṃ prema sphurati yena samastaṃ jagat 111 adhastāt jñānasya navīnasya vārtām vettuṃ icchati:

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
112 entro v’è l’alta mente u’ sì profondo 113 saver fu messo, che, se ’l vero è vero, 114 a veder tanto non surse il secondo.
query.error: **English:** 112 within it is the lofty mind in which such profound 113 knowledge was placed that, if the truth is true, 114 no second has ever arisen to see so much.
query.result: 112 tasminn antarvartate uttamā buddhiḥ yasminn evam gambhīraṃ 113 jñānam sthāpitam āsīt yathā, yadi satyam satyam asti, 114 tatto’pi adhikaṃ draṣṭum na ko’pi jātaḥ.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
115 Appresso vedi il lume di quel cero 116 che giù in carne più a dentro vide 117 l’angelica natura e ’l ministero.
query.error: **English:** 115 Next you will see the light of that candle 116 which down in the flesh saw more deeply 117 the angelic nature and the ministry.
query.result: 115 Tataḥ paśyasi prakāśaṃ tasya pradīpasya 116 Yaḥ adhaḥ śarīre 'pi adhikaṃ adhyagacchat 117 Daivikaṃ svarūpaṃ ca sevāṃ ca.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
118 Ne l’altra piccioletta luce ride 119 quello avvocato de’ tempi cristiani 120 del cui latino Augustin si provide.
query.error: **English:** 118 In the other little light smiles 119 that advocate of Christian times 120 from whose Latin Augustine provided himself.
query.result: 118 Apare caṇḍaprabhāyāṃ hasati 119 sa niyuktaḥ kṛṣṭakālasya 120 yasya lātikena agastiḥ pūrṇo 'bhūt.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
121 Or se tu l’occhio de la mente trani 122 di luce in luce dietro a le mie lode, 123 già de l’ottava con sete rimani.
query.error: **English:** 121 Now if you sharpen the eye of your mind 122 from light to light, following my praises, 123 you are already seven steps up the eighth sphere.
query.result: 121 Atha yadi tvam manaścakṣuḥ 122 Prakāśāt prakāśam anugamya mama stutīnām, 123 Aṣṭamasya sapta padānām adhikaḥ asi.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
124 Per vedere ogne ben dentro vi gode 125 l’anima santa che ’l mondo fallace 126 fa manifesto a chi di lei ben ode.
query.error: **English:** 124 To see every good thing within it, the holy soul rejoices, 125 which makes the deceptive world 126 manifest to those who listen well to it.
query.result: 124 Sarvaṃ śubhaṃ paśyāmi tasya madhye 125 Ātmā pavitraḥ yaḥ lokam mithyā 126 Prakāśayati yaḥ śṛṇoti tam śubham.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
127 Lo corpo ond’ ella fu cacciata giace 128 giuso in Cieldauro; ed essa da martiro 129 e da essilio venne a questa pace.
query.error: **English:** 127 The body from which she was expelled lies 128 down below in Cieldauro; and she from martyrdom 129 and exile came to this peace.
query.result: 127 Śarīram yasya sā nirvāsitā babhūva 128 Adhastāt Cieldauro nāma nagare; sā ca martyāt 129 Tathā nirvāsāt prāptā śāntim imām.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
130 Vedi oltre fiammeggiar l’ardente spiro 131 d’Isidoro, di Beda e di Riccardo, 132 che a considerar fu più che viro.
query.error: **English:** 130 You see Isidore, Bede, and Richard 131 flaming with ardent spirit beyond, 132 who was more than a man in contemplation.
query.result: 130 Paśya param jvalantam ugraṃ prāṇam 131 Īśvarasya, Vedasya ca, Ṛcasya ca, 132 Yaḥ cintane adhikaḥ puruṣāt āsīt.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.

query.result: 133 Imāḥ taranga mama prati tava dṛṣṭim ānayanti, 134 eṣa ca prakāśaḥ asti ekaḥ ātmā yaḥ, cinteṣu 135 ghana niṣṭhāsu mṛtyave vilम्बितam āgacchatīva adṛṣṭavān:

148 se non colà dove gioir s’insempra.
query.error: **English:** 148 except there where joy is sempiternal.
query.result: 148 vinā tatra yatra ānandaḥ sarvadā asti.
